titles.title: Partnership to Improve Seniors Access to Medicare Act
To establish a loan repayment program for qualifying physicians and nurse practitioners participating in the Medicare Program.
Partnership to Improve Seniors Access to Medicare Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Partnership to Improve Seniors Access to Medicare Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to establish a student loan repayment program for qualified physicians and nurse practitioners participating in Medicare who agree to accept Medicare individuals who seek the services of such health professionals.
